humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The oracle bone inscriptions are in the form of Natu's "Guanxiong Axe" or "Tiaohat" (see "Other pictures" below), and are a kind of weapon. (Li Xueqin, Xieming Wen) and the late Shang Dynasty oracle inscriptions with later-shaped weapon handle of bamboo strips with " ‚óé " separation. Xie Mingwen believes that the falling off of " ‚óé " may be distorted phoneticization, using " ‚óé " (the first text of " member ") as the sound symbol of " or ". With the addition of decorative pens around the " ‚óé ", the " Tiao " shape has evolved into a " Ge " shape, which is the original version of the " Suo Wen" small seal. Later, the person under false change fonts, and mistakenly territory, country like guise as " or " original meaning or extended meaning, so the " or " will be attached to a knowing word, so "said the text," says: "or , Bang Ye. From the Âõó from the Ge, to keep one. One, the land."

" Or " is often used as the name of a person, country, or clan in Jia Jin inscriptions. For example, "Collection" 4268: "Yihaibu, Yongding (Zhen): Ling or come and return." Ji Lao or Lu: "Ji Lao or Zha (composition) Wen Kao Da Bai (Bo) ‚ñ°‚ñ°."

" Or " is also used as an adverb under the guise of " Zai " and " Yao ". Such as "South Tuen" 2991 + 620 + 2291 "or their child (?) Yu Tian", " baby " is a verb and ritual related to the whole sentence was intended that the glenoid to the farmland once again held the young festival. (Xie Mingwen) [Â¶æÂ≠ê]ßäí Pot: "Or [ÁõÆÂèà] (Âæó)[Êà∑Ëá£Ë¥ù] (Ë¥§) [Â∑¶Áä¨] (‰Ωê) Sima Jia."

" Or " also means region and territory. For example, "Compilation Lost" 690 + "Compilation" 36182: "When you meet (?) the barbarian leads the east or the east." It means that the barbarian leads the army to attack the east. Another example is „ù¨Zhong: "It is ten thousand years, and the four ors are guaranteed." Huang Jingui pointed out that the " or " in the inscriptions of the Western Zhou Dynasty is read as " domain ". Dasik further believes that the " or ", "‰ßï", "ÂÆÄ or" in the Spring and Autumn Inscriptions and even the Guodian Chu Bamboo Slips and Chu Silk Scripts should be read as " domains ", indicating regions and areas, not countries. Such as "Shangbo Bamboo Book One. "Jian Yi" Jian 7: "Wu (four) or (domain) Chuan (Shun)." "Guodian Jian. "Bao Yi" Jian 12 is "Sifang [Chuan Xin] (Shun) Zhi". Both "four-or" and "four directions" refer to the world in general.
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The oracle bone inscriptions are in the shape of Natu's "Guanxiong Axe" or "Tiaoyu Hat", which is a kind of weapon. Later, the Êü≤ÂΩ¢ and " ‚óé " were separated, possibly due to distorted phoneticization, with " ‚óé " (the first text of " member ") as the sound symbol of " or ".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[‚ë†] [hu√≤]
["Guangyun" Hu Guoqi, enters Germany, box. ]
(1) Yes.
(2) Pronouns. Generations. Some people; some people.
(3) Pronouns. Generation things. Yes; some; sometimes.
(4) Pronouns. Who. Express doubts.
(5) Adverbs. Maybe, maybe. Expressed not sure.
(6) Adverbs. also.
(7) Adverbs. Often; often.
(8) Conjunctions. Indicates selection or enumeration.
(9) Conjunctions. Represents hypothesis. As if, if.
(10) Particles.
(11) Through "confusion".

[Mao Ji] [Ge Zi Department] „ÄÄOr; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: Page 412, 18
[Ancient text]? [Jiyun] The more aggressive, the tone threshold. [Said Wen] Bang Ye. From the mouth to the Ge, to keep one. One, the ground. Pass as domain.„ÄÄ[Guang Yun] Hu Guoqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] won the northern cut,? Sound confusion. Doubt also. All people or people are doubtful words. [Yi¬∑Qian Gua] Or leap in the Yuan. [Zhuzi Original Meaning] Suspicious but undetermined remarks.„ÄÄConnect with confusion again. Strange too. [Mencius] It doesn't matter whether the king is unwise. ‚óéAccording to the six books, there are false borrowings, or the original word is Bang or the word, the borrowing is the doubt or the word, the descendants add soil as the domain, and add the heart for confusion. And the word "or" is only used for people or saying, and its original meaning is forgotten.
or
Source glyph
or
Name meaning
It means maybe, it means not sure, choose. It also means that there are people, some people, such as: people are inherently dead, or heavier than Mount Tai, or lighter than a feather.
